title: Jana Partners Urges Zendesk to Ditch Deal for SurveyMonkey Parent
sub_head: New York activist investor has big stake in Zendesk, wants it to terminate Momentive Global acquisition
body:
Jana Partners LLC owns a big stake in Zendesk Inc. and is urging the customer-service platform to abandon a deal it struck to buy the parent of web-survey company SurveyMonkey .
The New York activist urged Zendesk’s board to terminate the acquisition of Momentive Global Inc. now rather than wait months for a shareholder vote that appears likely to fail, according to a letter sent Tuesday to the company’s board.
